hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc #Set the below parameters manually package_name="ucarp" published_version="1.5.2"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- export work_dir=`pwd`
sudo yum install -y git libpcap.s390x libpcap-devel.s390x make gcc wget tar
#Download UCARP binary cd $work_dir wget https://download.pureftpd.org/pub/ucarp/ucarp-1.5.2.tar.gz tar -xvf ucarp-1.5.2.tar.gz
#Install UCARP cd ucarp-1.5.2 ./configure make ARCH=s390x install-strip
#Verify UCARP /usr/local/sbin/ucarp -h
#Clean up cd $work_dir cd .. sudo rm -rf $work_dir
